title: Digital Animation, "New York Times: The T Magazine", 2007
description: Digitial animation featuring parts of a capital letter "T" rearranging into different figures amidst the sound of cheering and flashing light bulbs.
justification: Although silkscreen poster design remains a central part of Apeloig’s practice, he is also constantly creating work in the field of moving graphics.&nbsp; This playful animation, designed for the New York Times T Style magazine, transforms the “T” logo into a myriad of figures.&nbsp; The soundtrack features the astonished cheers and flashbulbs associated with a person's arrival on a red carpet.&nbsp; Apeloig uses this digital medium to its fullest potential, deconstructing this single letter into a series of abstract shapes that are constantly re-invented.

tombstone.epitaph: Digital Animation, "New York Times: The T Magazine", 2007. Digital animation. Gift of Philippe Apeloig. 2013-16-6.
